name: Goat Speed Buster
description:
Race game with local multipalyer where you can control 4 animals driving crazy vehicles.

Keyboard controls:

  • W - Accelerate
  • S - Brake/Reverse
  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • Left Shift - Manual brake
  • Space Bar - Use object
  • Control - Backwards camera

GamePad controls:

  • L2/LT - Accelerate
  • Left Joystick - Direction
  • Square/X - Brake
  • R2/RT - Manual brake
  • X/A - Use object
  • Triangle/Y - Backwards camera
